definitions.definition: Willingness of action especially in behavior.
An incentive or reason for doing something.
A research rating that measures how the rational and emotional elements of a commercial affect consumer intention to consider, visit, or buy something.
examples: The motivation scores showed that 65% of people wanted to visit our website to learn more about the offer after watching the commercial.

main_definition: Willingness of action especially in behavior.
secondary_definitions: An incentive or reason for doing something.
( advertising ) A research rating that measures how the rational and emotional elements of a commercial affect consumer intention to consider, visit, or buy something.
